member.name: T:I7565DNM_DotNET.I7565DNM
member.summary: DLL for I-7565-DNM

member.name: F:I7565DNM_DotNET.I7565DNM.I7565DNM_PortNotActive
member.summary: The USB port doesn't be activated.

member.name: F:I7565DNM_DotNET.I7565DNM.I7565DNM_PortNoResp
member.summary: The USB port replied nothing.

member.name: F:I7565DNM_DotNET.I7565DNM.I7565DNM_PortInUse
member.summary: The USB port is used by another program.

member.name: F:I7565DNM_DotNET.I7565DNM.I7565DNM_ReStartPort
member.summary: The module has been re-plugged. Please restart your application.

member.name: F:I7565DNM_DotNET.I7565DNM.DNMXS_NoError
member.summary: No error

member.name: F:I7565DNM_DotNET.I7565DNM.DNMXS_UnKnowError
member.summary: The DeviceNet has some unknown errors.

member.name: F:I7565DNM_DotNET.I7565DNM.DNMXS_BoardNotActive
member.summary: The I-7565-DNM has not been activated.

member.name: F:I7565DNM_DotNET.I7565DNM.DNMXS_OnlineError
member.summary: The master MAC ID collides with other slave device in the DeviceNet network.

member.name: F:I7565DNM_DotNET.I7565DNM.DNMXS_CANBusError
member.summary: The CAN port can't send message. Please check the baud rate or the port of the CAN bus.

member.name: F:I7565DNM_DotNET.I7565DNM.DNMXS_Booting
member.summary: The I-7565-DNM is still booting.

member.name: F:I7565DNM_DotNET.I7565DNM.DNMXS_MACIDError
member.summary: The MAC ID is exceed the range(0 ~ 63)

member.name: F:I7565DNM_DotNET.I7565DNM.DNMXS_BaudRateError
member.summary: The baud rate is exceed the range(0 ~ 2)

member.name: F:I7565DNM_DotNET.I7565DNM.DNMXS_ConnectionTypeError
member.summary: The connection type is exceed the range (0 ~ 4)

member.name: F:I7565DNM_DotNET.I7565DNM.DNMXS_DuplicMasterMACID
member.summary: The MAC ID is the same with the master's ID.

member.name: F:I7565DNM_DotNET.I7565DNM.DNMXS_EEPROMError
member.summary: The EEPROM is out of order.

member.name: F:I7565DNM_DotNET.I7565DNM.DNMXS_NowScanning
member.summary: The I-7565-DNM is searching the slave.

member.name: F:I7565DNM_DotNET.I7565DNM.DNMXS_ScanListError
member.summary: The Scan List has some errors.

member.name: F:I7565DNM_DotNET.I7565DNM.DNMXS_DeviceExist
member.summary: The information of the slave device already exists.

member.name: F:I7565DNM_DotNET.I7565DNM.DNMXS_DeviceNotExist
member.summary: The information of the slave device doesn't exist.

member.name: F:I7565DNM_DotNET.I7565DNM.DNMXS_MapTableError
member.summary: The MapTable has some errors.

member.name: F:I7565DNM_DotNET.I7565DNM.DNMXS_ExplicitNotAllocate
member.summary: The Explicit connection is not established.

member.name: F:I7565DNM_DotNET.I7565DNM.DNMXS_PollNotAllocate
member.summary: The Poll connection is not established.

member.name: F:I7565DNM_DotNET.I7565DNM.DNMXS_BitStrobeNotAllocate
member.summary: The Strobe connection is not established.

member.name: F:I7565DNM_DotNET.I7565DNM.DNMXS_COSNotAllocate
member.summary: The COS connection is not established.

member.name: F:I7565DNM_DotNET.I7565DNM.DNMXS_CyclicNotAllocate
member.summary: The Cyclic connection is not established.

member.name: F:I7565DNM_DotNET.I7565DNM.DNMXS_PollAlreadyExist
member.summary: The Poll connection has been established.

member.name: F:I7565DNM_DotNET.I7565DNM.DNMXS_BitStrobeAlreadyExist
member.summary: The Bit-Strobe connection has been established.

member.name: F:I7565DNM_DotNET.I7565DNM.DNMXS_COSAlreadyExist
member.summary: The COS connection has been established.

member.name: F:I7565DNM_DotNET.I7565DNM.DNMXS_CyclicAlreadyExist
member.summary: The Cyclic connection has been established.

member.name: F:I7565DNM_DotNET.I7565DNM.DNMXS_CommunicationPause
member.summary: The communication between I-7565-DNM and all slave devices has been suspended.

member.name: F:I7565DNM_DotNET.I7565DNM.DNMXS_SlaveNoResp
member.summary: The slave has no any response.

member.name: F:I7565DNM_DotNET.I7565DNM.DNMXS_WaitForSlaveResp
member.summary: The I-7565-DNM is waiting for the response form the slave device.

member.name: F:I7565DNM_DotNET.I7565DNM.DNMXS_SlaveRespError
member.summary: The slave replied some errors.

member.name: F:I7565DNM_DotNET.I7565DNM.DNMXS_OutputDataLenError
member.summary: The output length of the I/O connection doesn't match the device's output length.

member.name: F:I7565DNM_DotNET.I7565DNM.DNMXS_InputDataLenError
member.summary: The input length of the I/O connection doesn't match the device's input length.

member.name: M:I7565DNM_DotNET.I7565DNM.I7565DNM_TotalI7565DNMModule(System.Byte@,System.Byte[])
member.summary: The function can get the count of total I-7565-DNM Modules in the user's PC.
member.param: [output] The list of all USB port in each modules.

member.name: M:I7565DNM_DotNET.I7565DNM.I7565DNM_ActiveModule(System.Byte)
member.summary: The function is used to activate the I-7565-DNM module. It must be called once before using the other functions of I-7565-DNM APIs.

member.name: M:I7565DNM_DotNET.I7565DNM.I7565DNM_CloseModule(System.Byte)
member.summary: The function is used to stop and close the USB driver. This method must be called once before exiting the user's application program.

member.name: M:I7565DNM_DotNET.I7565DNM.I7565DNM_GetDLLVersion
member.summary: The function can obtain the version information of I7565DNM.DLL.
member.returns: The DLL version information. For example: If 100(hex) is return, it means DLL version is 1.00. If 123(hex) is return, it means DLL version is 1.23

member.name: M:I7565DNM_DotNET.I7565DNM.I7565DNM_GetFirmwareVersion(System.Byte)
member.summary: The function can obtain the version information of the firmware inside the I-7565-DNM module.
member.returns: The firmware version information. For example: If 100(hex) is return, it means firmware version is 1.00. If 123(hex) is return, it means firmware version is 1.23.

member.name: M:I7565DNM_DotNET.I7565DNM.I7565DNM_ResetFirmware(System.Byte)
member.summary: The function is used to reset the I-7565-DNM firmware. When the users have changed the baud rate of CAN bus or changed the Masterâ€™s MAC ID, the function must be called to make the change enable. After calling this function, the users should wait for 1 or 2 seconds to make the firmware boot up completely.

member.name: M:I7565DNM_DotNET.I7565DNM.I7565DNM_GetMasterMACID(System.Byte)
member.summary: The function can get the MAC ID of the DeviceNet master (I-7565-DNM).

member.name: M:I7565DNM_DotNET.I7565DNM.I7565DNM_SetMasterMACID(System.Byte,System.Byte)
member.summary: The function can set the MAC ID of the DeviceNet master (I-7565-DNM). After calling this function, the users must call I7565DNM_ResetFirmware to make the change enabled. It will save the information in the EEPROM in the I-7565-DNM.
member.param: [input] The new MAC ID of the master. (0 ~ 63)

member.name: M:I7565DNM_DotNET.I7565DNM.I7565DNM_GetBaudRate(System.Byte)
member.summary: This function can help you to get the DeviceNet baud rate information of I-7565-DNM.
member.returns: The CAN bus baud rate information in the I-7565-DNM. 0 = 125Kbps , 1 = 250Kbps , 2 = 500Kbps.

member.name: M:I7565DNM_DotNET.I7565DNM.I7565DNM_SetBaudRate(System.Byte,System.Byte)
member.summary: This function can set the DeviceNet baud rate of the I-7565-DNM. After calling this function, you must call I7565DNM_ResetFirmware to reset the firmware to make change enabled.
member.param: [input] The new baud rate value. 0 = 125K bps , 1 = 250K bps , 2 = 500K bps

member.name: M:I7565DNM_DotNET.I7565DNM.I7565DNM_GetMasterStatus(System.Byte)
member.summary: The function is used to obtain the firmware status inside the I-7565-DNM. The users can call this function to make sure that the DeviceNet master is online successfully.

member.name: M:I7565DNM_DotNET.I7565DNM.I7565DNM_GetSlaveStatus(System.Byte,System.Byte)
member.summary: This function is to get the remote slave device's communication status.

member.name: M:I7565DNM_DotNET.I7565DNM.I7565DNM_StartDevice(System.Byte,System.Byte)
member.summary: This function is used to start to communicate with the specific device that the users applying to.

member.name: M:I7565DNM_DotNET.I7565DNM.I7565DNM_StopDevice(System.Byte,System.Byte)
member.summary: This function is used to stop to communicate with the destination device that the users appointed to.

member.name: M:I7565DNM_DotNET.I7565DNM.I7565DNM_StartAllDevice(System.Byte)
member.summary: This function is used to start to communicate with all slave devices in ScanList.

member.name: M:I7565DNM_DotNET.I7565DNM.I7565DNM_StopAllDevice(System.Byte)
member.summary: This function is used to stop to communicate with all destination devices in ScanList.

member.name: M:I7565DNM_DotNET.I7565DNM.I7565DNM_AddDevice(System.Byte,System.Byte,System.UInt16)
member.summary: This function can add the slave devices into the ScanList of the I-7565-DNM and save the information into the EEPROM. Before communicating with any slave devices, the users should call this function to add these devices.
member.param: [input] The remote slave device's MAC ID (0~63)

member.name: M:I7565DNM_DotNET.I7565DNM.I7565DNM_RemoveDevice(System.Byte,System.Byte)
member.summary: This function is used for removing the specified slave device from the ScanList in the I-7565-DNM. And the information of the device in EEPROM is erased at the same time.
member.param: [input] The remote slave device's MAC ID (0~63)

member.name: M:I7565DNM_DotNET.I7565DNM.I7565DNM_AddIOConnection(System.Byte,System.Byte,System.Byte,System.UInt16,System.UInt16,System.UInt16)
member.summary: This method is used to configure the I/O connection of the specific MAC ID device. The I-7565-DNM can get/set the data via the connection, which connects to the specific slave, according to the produced / consumed connection path of this slave device. This configuration data will be saved into EEPROM within the I-7565-DNM.
member.param: [input] The remote slave device's MAC ID (0~63)
[input] The remote slave device's I/O connection type. Explicit_Type(0), Poll_Type(1), Bit-Strobe_Type(2), COS_Type(3), Cyclic_Type(4)
[input] The remote slave device's input length. (Byte)
[input] The remote slave device's output length. (Byte)

member.name: M:I7565DNM_DotNET.I7565DNM.I7565DNM_RemoveIOConnection(System.Byte,System.Byte,System.Byte)
member.summary: The function is used to remove the I/O connection configuration.
member.param: [input] The remote slave device's MAC ID (0~63)
[input] The remote slave device's I/O connection type. Explicit_Type(0), Poll_Type(1), Bit-Strobe_Type(2), COS_Type(3), Cyclic_Type(4)

member.name: M:I7565DNM_DotNET.I7565DNM.I7565DNM_GetAttribute(System.Byte,System.Byte,System.Byte,System.Byte,System.Byte)
member.summary: This function is used to send the request command to retrieve the attribute value of the specific device's instance. Before calling this function, you must start the device. After calling this function, you should execute the "I7565DNM_GetAttributeValue" to get the response message returned from remote slave device.
member.param: [input] The remote slave device's MAC ID (0~63)

member.name: M:I7565DNM_DotNET.I7565DNM.I7565DNM_GetAttributeW(System.Byte,System.Byte,System.UInt16,System.UInt16,System.Byte)
member.summary: This function is used to send the request command to retrieve the attribute value of the specific device's instance. Before calling this function, you must start the device. After calling this function, you should execute the "I7565DNM_GetAttributeValue" to get the response message returned from remote slave device.
member.param: [input] The remote slave device's MAC ID (0~63)

member.name: M:I7565DNM_DotNET.I7565DNM.I7565DNM_IsGetAttributeOK(System.Byte,System.Byte)
member.summary: This function is used to check whether the I-7565-DNM has received the response message or not. After checking the response message, you should execute the "I7565DNM_GetAttributeValue" to get the response message returned from remote slave device.
member.param: [input] The remote slave device's MAC ID (0~63)

member.name: M:I7565DNM_DotNET.I7565DNM.I7565DNM_GetAttributeValue(System.Byte,System.Byte,System.UInt16@,System.Byte[])
member.summary: This function is used to get the attribute value of the specific device's instance from the remote slave device. Before calling this function, the users should call I7565DNM_GetAttribute to send request command first.
member.param: [input] The remote slave device's MAC ID (0~63)
[output] The length of the attribute value (in byte).
[output] The attribute value that returned from the slave device.

member.name: M:I7565DNM_DotNET.I7565DNM.I7565DNM_SetAttribute(System.Byte,System.Byte,System.Byte,System.Byte,System.Byte,System.UInt16,System.Byte[])
member.summary: The method is used to set the attribute of the specific device's instance. Before calling this function, you must start the device. After calling this function, you should execute the "I7565DNM_IsSetAttributeOK" to check the response message returned from the remote slave device.
member.param: [input] The remote slave device's MAC ID (0~63)
[input] The length of the attribute value (in byte).
[input] The attribute value that the users want to send.

member.name: M:I7565DNM_DotNET.I7565DNM.I7565DNM_SetAttributeW(System.Byte,System.Byte,System.UInt16,System.UInt16,System.Byte,System.UInt16,System.Byte[])
member.summary: The method is used to set the attribute of the specific device's instance. Before calling this function, you must start the device. After calling this function, you should execute the "I7565DNM_IsSetAttributeOK" to check the response message returned from the remote slave device.
member.param: [input] The remote slave device's MAC ID (0~63)
[input] The length of the attribute value (in byte).
[input] The attribute value that the users want to send.

member.name: M:I7565DNM_DotNET.I7565DNM.I7565DNM_IsSetAttributeOK(System.Byte,System.Byte)
member.summary: This function is used to get the response value after executing the "I7565DNM_SetAttribute" function.
member.param: [input] The remote slave device's MAC ID (0~63)

member.name: M:I7565DNM_DotNET.I7565DNM.I7565DNM_ClearAllConfig(System.Byte)
member.summary: This function will clear all configurations in the EEPROM of the I-7565-DNM.

member.name: M:I7565DNM_DotNET.I7565DNM.I7565DNM_SearchAllDevices(System.Byte)
member.summary: This function is used to retrieve all devices in DeviceNet network. Attention! This function will terminate all communications with remote devices. This function is usually used for developing or debugging applications.

member.name: M:I7565DNM_DotNET.I7565DNM.I7565DNM_SearchSpecificDevice(System.Byte,System.UInt16,System.Byte[])
member.summary: This function is used to retrieve some devices which specified by the users. Attention! This function will terminate all communications with remote devices. This function is usually used for developing or debugging applications.
member.param: [input] The amount of the slave's ID.
[input] The list of all slave's MAC ID.

member.name: M:I7565DNM_DotNET.I7565DNM.I7565DNM_IsSearchOK(System.Byte)
member.summary: This function will check whether the searching process has finished or not.

member.name: M:I7565DNM_DotNET.I7565DNM.I7565DNM_GetSearchedDevices(System.Byte,System.UInt16@,System.Byte[],System.Byte[],System.UInt16[],System.UInt16[])
member.summary: This function will get the device which have been searched in the network.
member.param: [output] The amount of all slave device which are found.
[output] The list of slave's MAC ID which are found.
[output] The list of slave's connection type which are found. Explicit_Type(0), Poll_Type(1), Bit-Strobe_Type(2), COS_Type(3), Cyclic_Type(4)
[output] The list of slave's input length which are found.
[output] The list of slave's output length which are found.

member.name: M:I7565DNM_DotNET.I7565DNM.I7565DNM_GetDeviceInfoFromScanList(System.Byte,System.Byte,System.UInt16@,System.Byte[],System.UInt16[],System.UInt16[],System.UInt16[])
member.summary: This function will get the ScanList data of certain device in the I-7565-DNM.
member.param: [output] The amount of all information items.
[output] The list of slave's connection type. Explicit_Type(0), Poll_Type(1), Bit-Strobe_Type(2), COS_Type(3), Cyclic_Type(4)
[output] The list of slave's input length.
[output] The list of slave's output length.
[output] The list of slave's expected packet rate.

member.name: M:I7565DNM_DotNET.I7565DNM.I7565DNM_GetScanList(System.Byte,System.UInt16@,System.Byte[],System.Byte[],System.UInt16[],System.UInt16[],System.UInt16[])
member.summary: This function will get all the ScanList data in the I-7565-DNM.
member.param: [output] The data count of all the information.
[output] The MAC ID of all the slave devices in the ScanList.
[output] The connection type of all the slave devices in the ScanList. Explicit_Type(0), Poll_Type(1), Bit-Strobe_Type(2), COS_Type(3), Cyclic_Type(4)
[output] The input data length of all the slave devices in the ScanList.
[output] The output data length of all the slave devices in the ScanList.
[output] The EPR value of all the slave devices in the ScanList.

member.name: M:I7565DNM_DotNET.I7565DNM.I7565DNM_ImportEEPROM(System.Byte,System.UInt16,System.Byte[],System.Byte[],System.UInt16[],System.UInt16[],System.UInt16[])
member.summary: This function will write all specific devices' information in the ScanList to the EEPROM.
member.param: [input] The data count of all the information.
[input] The MAC ID of all the slave devices.
[input] The connection type of all slave devices. Explicit_Type(0), Poll_Type(1), Bit-Strobe_Type(2), COS_Type(3), Cyclic_Type(4)
[input] The input data length of all slave devices.
[input] The output data length of all slave devices.
[input] The EPR value of all slave devices.

member.name: M:I7565DNM_DotNET.I7565DNM.I7565DNM_SendExplicitMSG(System.Byte,System.Byte,System.Byte,System.Byte,System.Byte,System.UInt16,System.Byte[])
member.summary: This function is to get the data according with the produced connection path of the specific MAC ID device via the I/O connection.
member.param: [input] The remote slave device's MAC ID (0~63)
[input] The length of the attribute value (in byte).
[input] The attribute value that the users want to send.

member.name: M:I7565DNM_DotNET.I7565DNM.I7565DNM_SendExplicitMSG_W(System.Byte,System.Byte,System.Byte,System.UInt16,System.UInt16,System.UInt16,System.Byte[])
member.summary: This function is to get the data according with the produced connection path of the specific MAC ID device via the I/O connection.
member.param: [input] The remote slave device's MAC ID (0~63)
[input] The length of the attribute value (in byte).
[input] The attribute value that the users want to send.

member.name: M:I7565DNM_DotNET.I7565DNM.I7565DNM_IsExplicitMSGRespOK(System.Byte,System.Byte)
member.summary: This function is used to check whether the I-7565-DNM has received the response message or not. After checking the response message, you should execute the "I7565DNM_GetExplicitMSGRespValue" to get the response message returned from remote slave device.
member.param: [input] The remote slave device's MAC ID (0~63)

member.name: M:I7565DNM_DotNET.I7565DNM.I7565DNM_GetExplicitMSGRespValue(System.Byte,System.Byte,System.UInt16@,System.Byte[])
member.summary: This function is used to get the attribute value of the specific device's instance from the remote slave device. Before calling this function, the users should call I7565DNM_SendExplicitMSG to send request command first.
member.param: [input] The remote slave device's MAC ID (0~63)
[output] The length of the attribute value (in byte).
[output] The attribute value that returned from the slave device.

member.name: M:I7565DNM_DotNET.I7565DNM.I7565DNM_ReadInputData(System.Byte,System.Byte,System.Byte,System.UInt16@,System.Byte[])
member.summary: This function is to get the data according with the produced connection path of the specific MAC ID device via the I/O connection.
member.param: [input] The remote slave device's MAC ID (0~63)
[input] The connection type of the remote slave. Explicit_Type(0), Poll_Type(1), Bit-Strobe_Type(2), COS_Type(3), Cyclic_Type(4)
[output] The length of the I/O data (In byte).

member.name: M:I7565DNM_DotNET.I7565DNM.I7565DNM_WriteOutputData(System.Byte,System.Byte,System.Byte,System.UInt16,System.Byte[])
member.summary: The function will set the data according with the consumed connection path of the specific MAC ID device via the I/O connection.
member.param: [input] The remote slave device's MAC ID (0~63)
[input] The connection type of the remote slave. Explicit_Type(0), Poll_Type(1), Bit-Strobe_Type(2), COS_Type(3), Cyclic_Type(4)
[Input] The length of the I/O data (In byte).

member.name: M:I7565DNM_DotNET.I7565DNM.I7565DNM_ReadbackOutputData(System.Byte,System.Byte,System.Byte,System.UInt16@,System.Byte[])
member.summary: The function will read the data according with the consumed connection path of the specific MAC ID device via the I/O connection.
member.param: [input] The remote slave device's MAC ID (0~63)
[input] The connection type of the remote slave. Explicit_Type(0), Poll_Type(1), Bit-Strobe_Type(2), COS_Type(3), Cyclic_Type(4)
[output] The length of the I/O data (In byte).

member.name: M:I7565DNM_DotNET.I7565DNM.I7565DNM_PauseIOConnection(System.Byte,System.Byte)
member.summary: This function will pause in the IO connection with the specific device.

member.name: M:I7565DNM_DotNET.I7565DNM.I7565DNM_ResumeIOConnection(System.Byte,System.Byte)
member.summary: This function will resume the IO connection with the specific device.

member.name: T:I7565DNM_DotNET.I7565DNM.ConType
member.summary: Connection Type

member.name: F:I7565DNM_DotNET.I7565DNM.ConType.ConType_Explicit
member.summary: EXPLICIT Message Connection Type

member.name: F:I7565DNM_DotNET.I7565DNM.ConType.ConType_Poll
member.summary: POLL I/O Connection Type

member.name: F:I7565DNM_DotNET.I7565DNM.ConType.ConType_BitStrobe
member.summary: Bit-Strobe I/O Connection Type

member.name: F:I7565DNM_DotNET.I7565DNM.ConType.ConType_COS
member.summary: COS(Change-Of-State) I/O Connection Type

member.name: F:I7565DNM_DotNET.I7565DNM.ConType.ConType_Cyclic
member.summary: CYCLIC I/O Connection Type
